version_description:
Hello money farmers, the game is now officially polyglot!
- The game now has these language settings: English, Portuguese-br, French, Italian, German and Spanish.
- We loved your reviews so far, please continue sending feedback about your thoughts and rate our game!
- The Power Rain has suffered some changes, and now can be activated more frequently!

Hey money farmers, we have some great news for you today!

* New CRAZY characters have arrived into the game, these characters help you collect money and fruits faster! They also multiply all profit generated by the branches!
* Now each quest completed rewards you with FAME POINTS, they are used to hire new characters to work for you! Spoiler alert, you can meet up with unique celebrities!
* Diamonds have been added to the game's economy.
